From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To grant shell access and enter shell access grant configuration mode, use the **platform shell** command in global configuration mode. To disable this function, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to grant shell access:
ExtraInfo: This command should be entered before using the request platform software system shell command.
